item1Desc.name: Sauce Labs Onesie
item1Desc.desc: Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel.

item2Desc.name: Sauce Labs Bike Light
item2Desc.desc: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.
